item.title: Sort Transformed Array
item.description: Sort Transformed Array LeetCode #360 Description Given a sorted array of integers nums and integer values a, b and c. Apply a function of the form f(x) = ax^2 + bx + c to each element x in the array. The returned array must be in sorted order. Expected time complexity: O(n) Example: nums = [-4, -2, 2, 4], a = 1, b = 3, c = 5,
